title: Rear Suspension Unit - Inspection

body.body: Warning - Suspension - Contents under Pressure, Never Disassemble the RSU

Contents under pressure. Never attempt to open this rear suspension unit. Never attempt to service this rear suspension unit. Never incinerate, puncture, or disassemble this rear suspension unit. Opening this rear suspension unit may result in severe injuries or even death.
The rear suspension units are sealed units and do not have any internally user serviceable parts.

metadata.ModelsTaxonomyLink: LK2; LJ2; LGX; LL1; LG1; YL1; YK1; YJ1; HH7; HG7; HF7; HE7; HDA; HD5; HD4; HD2; HD

body.body: Clean all components and inspect for damage/wear to:
drag link, its bearings, sleeves and seals,
rear suspension unit upper and lower mounting sleeve and bearing,
